about_the_game:
SPACE ACCIDENT Official Soundtrack is the music included in our game. The OST includes 2 original tracks from the game: the main theme and background music that plays while reading notes or being in the main menu.

The soundtrack is an atmospheric and somewhat dramatic adventure in a cold and lonely space full of mystery and hope. The total duration of the tracks is 16:41. Happy listening!
